name: FlyFly (HeneGames)
description:
This is a Multiplayer game, which can fit a maximum of 12 players.  When you press the start button, you will directly join the game where the other players are. Test with your friends who is the strongest fly in the kitchen.

W = Pitch up

A = Roll left

S = Pitch down

D = Roll right

Q = Yaw left

E = Yaw Right

LSift = Turbo

Space = Shoot

Use mouse to look around.
